title: Snuff Bottle
description: snuff bottle, unusually carved; a philosopher and attendant on one side, bamboo tree on the other; the Pine Tree, Bamboo and Plum are symbols of which the Chinese say \'These trees are like friends because they keep green in cold weather\'; all three of these trees are connected by the Chinese with longevity
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Augustus L. Searle
